00033 ArabCalc::ArabCalc(string ekspresi,int mode,int size) :bil(size),operatorx(size){
00034         this->ekspresi = ekspresi;
00035         this->mode = mode;

00045 
00050 float ArabCalc::Calculate(){
00051         float hasil;
00052         if(mode == 1)
00053     {
00054                 hasil = CalculatePrefix();
00055         }
00056         else if(mode == 2)
00057         {
00058                 hasil = CalculateInfix();
00059         }
00060         else if(mode == 3)
00061         {
00062                 hasil = CalculatePostfix();
00063         }
00064         return hasil;
00065 }

00071 void ArabCalc::SmallCalculate(Stack<float> &bil,Stack<string> &operatorx)
00072 {
00073         float popbil1;
00074         float popbil2;
00075         string dumpoperator;
00076         float dumpbil;
00077         popbil1 = bil.getLastData();
00078         bil>>dumpbil;
00079         popbil2 = bil.getLastData();
00080         bil>>dumpbil;
00081         string popoperator = operatorx.getLastData();
00082         operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00083         if(popoperator == "*")
00084         {
00085                 bil<< popbil2*popbil1;
00086         }
00087         else if(popoperator == ":")
00088         {
00089                 bil<< popbil2/popbil1;
00090         }
00091         else if(popoperator == "/")
00092         {
00093                 int a = (int) floor(popbil2/popbil1 - 0.5);
00094                 bil<< a;
00095         }
00096         else if(popoperator == "%")
00097         {
00098                 int tempint1 = (int) floor(popbil1 + 0.5);
00099                 int tempint2 = (int) floor(popbil2 + 0.5);
00100                 float hasil = (float)(tempint2%tempint1);
00101                 bil<< hasil;
00102         }
00103 
00104         else if(popoperator == "+")
00105         {
00106                 bil<< popbil2+popbil1;
00107         }
00108         else if(popoperator == "-")
00109         {
00110                 bil<< popbil2-popbil1;
00111         }
00112 }

00118 float ArabCalc::CalculateInfix(){
00119         string dumpoperator;
00120         float dumpbil;
00121         float hasil;
00122         string ekspresitemp = ekspresi;
00123         string temp;
00124         while(ekspresitemp.length() != 0)
00125         {
00126                 int isCompleteRead = 0;
00127                 int ctemp = 0; //Menghitung panjang buffer angka
00128                 while(ekspresitemp[0] == '0' || ekspresitemp[0] == '1' || ekspresitemp[0] == '2' || ekspresitemp[0] == '3' || ekspresitemp[0] == '4' || ekspresitemp[0] == '5'
00129                 || ekspresitemp[0] == '6'|| ekspresitemp[0] == '7' || ekspresitemp[0] == '8' || ekspresitemp[0] == '9' || ekspresitemp[0] == '.')
00130                 {
00131                         temp += ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00132                         ctemp++;
00133                         ekspresitemp.erase(0,1);
00134                         isCompleteRead = 1;
00135                 }
00136                 if(isCompleteRead == 1)
00137                 {       
00138                         bil<< atof(temp.c_str());
00139                         temp.erase(0,ctemp);
00140                 }
00141                 if(ekspresitemp[0] == '+' || ekspresitemp[0] == '-' || ekspresitemp[0] == '*' || ekspresitemp[0] == ':' || ekspresitemp[0] == '/' || ekspresitemp[0] == '%' || ekspresitemp[0] == '('|| ekspresitemp[0] == ')')
00142                 {
00143                         if(operatorx.isEmpty() || ekspresitemp[0] == '(')
00144                         {
00145                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00146 
00147                         }
00148                         else
00149                         {
00150                                 if(ekspresitemp[0] == '+' || ekspresitemp[0] == '-')
00151                                 {
00152                                         if(operatorx.getLastData() == "*" || operatorx.getLastData() == ":"|| operatorx.getLastData() == "/" || operatorx.getLastData() == "%" || operatorx.getLastData() == "+" || operatorx.getLastData() == "-")
00153                                         {
00154                                                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00155                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00156                                         }
00157                                         else
00158                                         {
00159                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00160 
00161                                         }
00162                                 }
00163                                 else if(ekspresitemp[0] == '*' || ekspresitemp[0] == '/' || ekspresitemp[0] == '%' || ekspresitemp[0] == ':')
00164                                 {
00165 
00166                                         if(operatorx.getLastData() == "*" || operatorx.getLastData() == "/" || operatorx.getLastData() == ":"  || operatorx.getLastData() == "%")
00167                                         {
00168                                                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00169                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00170                                         }
00171                                         else
00172                                         {
00173                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00174                                         }
00175                                 }
00176                                 else if(ekspresitemp[0] == ')')
00177                                 {
00178                                         while(operatorx.getLastData() != "(")
00179                                         {
00180                                                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00181                                         }
00182                                         operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00183                                 }
00184 
00185                         }
00186                         ekspresitemp.erase(0,1);
00187                 }
00188         }
00189         while(!operatorx.isEmpty())
00190         {
00191                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00192 
00193         }
00194         hasil = bil.getLastData();
00195         //Cleaning
00196         while(!bil.isEmpty())
00197         {
00198                 bil>>dumpbil;
00199         }
00200         while(!operatorx.isEmpty())
00201         {
00202                 operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00203         }
00204         return hasil;
00205 }

00211 int ArabCalc::CalculatePrefix() {
00212     char buffer[15];
00213     int i, len, j;
00214     int op1, op2, x;
00215     Stack<int> s;
00216         int dumpint;
00217     len = ekspresi.length();
00218     j = 0;
00219         
00220     for(i=len-1; i>=0; i--){
00221         if(ekspresi[i]>='0' && ekspresi[i]<='9'){
00222             buffer[j++] = ekspresi[i];
00223         }
00224         else if(ekspresi[i]==' '){
00225             if(j>0){
00226                                 char tempbuffer[15];
00227                                 int counter = 0;
00228                                 buffer[j] = '\0';
00229                                 for(int i =j-1;i>=0;i--)
00230                                 {
00231                                         tempbuffer[counter] = buffer[i];
00232                                         counter++;
00233                                 }
00234                 tempbuffer[j] = '\0';
00235                 x = atof(tempbuffer);
00236                 s<<x;
00237                 j = 0;
00238             }
00239         }
00240         else if(ekspresi[i]=='+' || ekspresi[i]=='-' || ekspresi[i]=='*' || ekspresi[i]==':' || ekspresi[i]=='%' || ekspresi[i]=='/'){
00241             op1 = s.getLastData();
00242             s>>dumpint;
00243             op2 = s.getLastData();
00244             s>>dumpint;
00245             switch(ekspresi[i]){
00246                 case '+':
00247                     s<<op2 + op1;
00248                     break;
00249                 case '-':
00250                     s<<(op2 - op1);
00251                     break;
00252                 case '*':
00253                     s<<(op2 * op1);
00254                     break;
00255                 case ':':
00256                     s<<(op2 / op1);
00257                     break;
00258                 case '%': // di c++ nggak bisa int mod int
00259                     while (op2 >= op1) {
00260                         op2 = op2 - op1;
00261                     }
00262                     s<<(op2);
00263                     break;
00264                 case '/':
00265                     int div;
00266                     div = (int)floor(op2 / op1);
00267                     s<<(div);
00268                     break;
00269             }
00270         }
00271     }
00272     return s.getLastData();
00273 }

00279 int ArabCalc::CalculatePostfix() {
00280     char buffer[15];
00281     int i, len, j;
00282     int op1, op2, x;
00283     Stack<int> s;
00284     len = ekspresi.length();
00285     j = 0;
00286         int dumpint;
00287     for(i=0; i<len;i++){
00288 
00289         if(ekspresi[i]>='0' && ekspresi[i]<='9'){
00290             buffer[j++] = ekspresi[i];
00291         }
00292         else if(ekspresi[i]==' '){
00293             if(j>0){
00294                 buffer[j] = '\0';
00295                 x = atof(buffer);
00296                 s<<x;
00297                 j = 0;
00298             }
00299         }
00300         else if(ekspresi[i]=='+' || ekspresi[i]=='-' || ekspresi[i]=='*' || ekspresi[i]==':' || ekspresi[i]=='%' || ekspresi[i]=='/'){
00301             op1 = s.getLastData();
00302             s>>dumpint;
00303             op2 = s.getLastData();
00304             s>>dumpint;
00305             switch(ekspresi[i]){
00306                 case '+':
00307                     s<<(op2 + op1);
00308                     break;
00309                 case '-':
00310                     s<<(op2 - op1);
00311                     break;
00312                 case '*':
00313                     s<<(op2 * op1);
00314                     break;
00315                 case ':':
00316                     s<<(op2 / op1);
00317                     break;
00318                 case '%': // di c++ nggak bisa int mod int
00319                     while (op2 >= op1) {
00320                         op2 = op2 - op1;
00321                     }
00322                     s<<(op2);
00323                     break;
00324                 case '/':
00325                     int div;
00326                     div = (int)floor(op2 / op1);
00327                     s<<(div);
00328                     break;
00329             }
00330         }
00331     }
00332     return s.getLastData();
00333 }
